Key:
(I came outside because I wanted fresh air,
but it's nice to walk by yourself sometimes.
Makes it easier to organize your thoughts.)

(It feels like the days are going by so quickly
nowadays, but there's still so much to be done.)
Now, where should I go?

(Yet, I put one foot in front of the other.
Well, at times like this, that's all I can do.)
Yeah. The park at night is pretty relaxing.
Now, then... What to do?

(In the end, I don't know any more about dating
or the barrier. I feel like nothing's changed...
Is it really okay to continue like this?)
Shido...?
Hm? R-Rinne...?!
Thank goodness. I thought you might be here.
Yeah... I thought you went home, Rinne.

Ahaha... I saw you walking in front of your house.
I just wondered what was wrong.

Oh, well... I thought it might be nice to do some
quiet thinking once in a while.
You haven't decided yet, have you Shido...?
Haven't decided, what do you mean?

If you think you want to protect someone and make
them happy, you have to keep thinking of them as
precious, you know?

I don't really understand...
What are you talking about?

I'm talking about love. What you're worrying
over... Was I wrong?

Huh?!
Err, ahh... Well, you see...
It's sort of like that, but sort of not...

See. If it's about you, even I can understand.
You have to officially choose someone,
or it's not nice to the girls.

Err... Sorry. I feel like this is
kind of different...

If you're with someone precious to you, I'm sure
it will become a truly wonderful love.

So, try your best next time, okay?
All right, then. Good night.
Right, thanks. Good night.
I couldn't make a decision at all...

(Or rather, I got distracted by what Rinne said
and forgot what I was thinking about...)
But I wonder why Rinne said something like that...
If you're with someone precious to you, I'm sure\nit will become a truly wonderful love.

Ah, jeez! I don't really get it! I'm just going
to sleep for tonight!

(To be honest, even if I think on this any more,
I won't get any further.)
Good night...
